mapper.select: SELECT rownum as board_no , bo_no , bo_cd , a.mem_id as mem_id , c.mem_name as mem_name , bo_title , bo_content , bo_reg_date , bo_mod_date , bo_hit , b.code_name as code_name , b.code_parent_cd as code_parent_cd FROM board a, code_board b, member c where a.bo_cd = b.code_cd and a.mem_id = c.mem_id AND bo_no = #{boNo}

SELECT rownum as board_no , bo_no , bo_cd , a.mem_id as mem_id , c.mem_name as mem_name , bo_title , bo_content , TO_CHAR(bo_reg_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as bo_reg_date , bo_mod_date , bo_hit , b.code_name as code_name , b.code_parent_cd as code_parent_cd FROM board a, code_board b, member c where a.bo_cd = b.code_cd and a.mem_id = c.mem_id AND b.code_parent_cd= #{boardParentCd}
SELECT bo_no , bo_cd , mem_id , bo_title , bo_content , bo_reg_date , bo_mod_date , bo_hit FROM board WHERE mem_id =#{memId}
SELECT count(bo_no) FROM board a, code_board b WHERE 1=1 and a.bo_cd = b.code_cd and b.code_parent_cd=#{boardParentCd}
